Intro.p: Holds federal funding elements for a Local Education Agency.

Item.Description: Holds federal funding elements for an LEA.

Description.p: The Id (GUID) that uniquely identifies the LEA.
The Id (GUID) that identifies the school where federal funds being tracked.
The federal programs the LEA is participating in.

An indication that the local education agency (LEA) notified the state of the LEA's intention to use REAP-Flex Alternative Uses of Funding Authority during the school year as specified in the Title VI, Section 6211 of ESEA as amended.
